duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement lesson plans that meet the individual needs, interests, and abilities of students
Manage classroom activities to create a safe, supportive, and positive learning environment
Assess students' progress and use data to plan further instruction and provide additional support when needed
Communicate with parents/guardians to discuss student progress and address any concerns or issues
Stay up-to-date with educational technology and implement it effectively in the classroom

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field (Master's preferred)
